sentence: Angry at the refusal of Brian Kemp to overturn the results of the 2020 presidential election in Georgia, Trump recruited David Perdue to run against him for governor.
author: Fred Bauer
title: Trump as GOP Kingmaker

title: Primary takeaways: Election denier wins, bad behavior dooms Cawthorn
